Megatron/Wildrider/Motormaster/Speedbreaker

Megatron turns too Switchblade, "Yes, but I have important buisness right
now." He presses a button on the consol, and a microphone emerges from it.
As he speaks in it, Megatron's voice if projected throughout the base.
"Wildrider, Breakdown, head to these coordinates," Megatron says, giving
the coordinates that Switchblade gave him.

Wildrider hears his chance at leaving this guard duty, he looks at
Breakdown, then at Drag Strip and Speedbreaker, "You suckers gotta stay
here" he says cackling, "Come on Breakdown" he yells, as he runs to the
elevator. It brings him to the main floor, and not bothering to wait till
he is outside, transforms into car mode, and almost hits Motormaster on his
way out. "Watch where you're going you runt" Motormaster challenges, but
it's to late.

Speedbreaker looks inside the cell with Symphony. "Man o man, am I glad I
wasnt you when the Terrorcons found you" he jokes.
